channel.title: discover on Yu-Fen Huang

item.title: Hula Instrument - ʻulili and ʻukēkē
item.description: It was always amazing to watch Merrie Monarch. Besides hula, I can learn about Hawaiian mele (songs) and also the hula instruments. I’ve been watching Merrie Monarch for 3 years, and I’m still learning about the hula instruments that I’ve never seen. In Merrie Monarch 2019, there are two interesting instruments - ʻulili and ʻukēkē. ʻulili I thought it was some kind of ʻuliʻuli while watching TV. But kumu Noe told us that it was ʻulili.
